It was a pleasure to announce the arrival of the first of 106 new green buses in ,#,SurreyBC,. 

This investment makes sure residents can get where they want, quickly, safely and in an enviromentaly friendly way. ,#,BuildingOurCommunities,pic.twitter.com/HFmgfqJBJz
Are they electric? If not this is a waste of money period.
Exactly.  Sadly, they are faux green (compressed natural gas).
I mean Seattle has gone all electric busses its cheaper and better in every way.
There are 4 electric buses undergoing a trial now,http://www.,cbc.ca/news/canada/br,itish-columbia/battery-bus-vancouver-1.4076487, ,…

Natural gas is not clean.
In fact, fracked natural gas causes more greenhouse gas emissions than coal. Canada needs electric buses and solar shelter charging stations please. ,http://www.,cbc.ca/news/canada/ma,nitoba/opinion-nazim-cicek-winnipeg-electric-buses-1.4595527, ,…,pic.twitter.com/Xka4OxUGNS
